mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) as zs, count(case when jc.CZZT='未处置' then 1 else null end) as wcz, count(case when jc.CZZT='处置中' then 1 else null end) as czz, count(case when jc.CZZT='已处置' then 1 else null end) as ycz, --事件类型 count(case when jc.SJLX='治安事件' then 1 else null end) as zasj, count(case when jc.SJLX='卫生事件' then 1 else null end) as wssj, count(case when jc.SJLX='能源事件' then 1 else null end) as nysj, count(case when jc.SJLX='矛盾纠纷' then 1 else null end) as mdjf, count(case when jc.SJLX='报修事件' then 1 else null end) as bxsj
FROM (SELECT * FROM [dbo].[ZHSQ_YC]
and XQID = #{xqid} and SQID = #{sqid} ) as jc
